page.title: 13Normanby Life Styles
page.content: Our questionnaires asked the people of Normanby what electrical appliances there were in their homes.Out of 23 questionnaires returned everyone had a refrigerator and most people had a washing machine.Not many people in Normanby had a microwave or stereo equipment.One house in Normanby had everything,a refrigerator,video, microwave,dishwasher,stereo equipment, colour T.V. and washing machine but no dishwasher.Only 3 people out of 22 sheets returned had a micro computer. One of the families who had a computer had a BBC the other two have Commodore Vic 20 and Spectrum 48K. The three people use educational programs more than games. The children use the computers the most. Everybody who returned their sheets in Normanby does their main shopping in Scunthorpe.
